types.description: Mediaplayer playlist stored in the browser (it extsts even if the mediaplayer is closed).

path.description: URL of mediafile (in 'filesystem:' scheme for local files).

error.description: True if the file has failed to play ('playbackError' with its URL called).

position.description: Index of item in the 'items' array to play next.

pendingPlaybackRequest.description: Informs that a request to play current item has been received. This flag is reset automatically.

functions.name: playAt
functions.description: Sets playlist positions and sets flag of pending play request. Then fires the onPlaylistChanged event.

functions.name: setPlaybackError
functions.description: Marks the URL as failed to play one. Mediaplayer will visually marks such an item. Then fires the onPlaylistChanged event.

functions.name: getPlaylist
functions.description: Returns current play list, position and flag of penging play request.

parameters.name: resetPendingPlaybackRequest
parameters.description: If true the result will include pending playback request status and this status will be reset.

parameters.name: playlist
parameters.description: Mediaplayer playlist stored in the browser (it extsts even if the mediaplayer is closed).

functions.name: togglePlaylistPanel
functions.description: Shows or hides the playlist panel.

functions.name: toggleFullscreen
functions.description: Switches fullscreen mode on/off for the mediaplayer.

events.name: onPlaylistChanged
events.descrition: Notifies that playlist content or state has been changed. Data could be retrieved via 'getPlaylist'.
